channel.title: Homes on Welcome to Yuan Gao's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Welcome to Yuan Gao's Homepage

item.description: Biography I am an Associate Professor at Wuhan University. Prior to that, I was a senior researcher at Tencent AI Lab. I finished my PhD study in Electronic Engineering Department of City University of Hong Kong, during which I have visited Center for Cognition, Vision, and Learning (CCVL) of UCLA. I have been working on several projects across different subjects/areas by Statistical Machine Learning, including Computer Vision with Prof. Alan Yuille, and Complex Network with Prof.
